00035 namespace brics_3d {

00037 std::string Benchmark::timeStamp = ""; // deduced from time-stamp
00038 std::string Benchmark::directoryName = ""; // deduced from time-stamp
00039 #ifdef WIN32
00040         std::string Benchmark::seperator = "\\"; // one \ is escape character...
00041 #else
00042         std::string Benchmark::seperator = "/";
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 Benchmark::Benchmark() {
00046         Benchmark("unnamedBenchmark");
00047 }
00048 
00049 Benchmark::Benchmark(std::string benchmarkName) {
00050         this->benchmarkName = benchmarkName;
00051         setupTargetFile();
00052 }
00053 
00054 Benchmark::~Benchmark() {
00055         output.flush();
00056         output.close();
00057 }
00058 
00059 void Benchmark::setupTargetFile() {
00060         string pathName = std::string(BRICS_LOGFILES_DIR);
00061 
00062         if (Benchmark::timeStamp.compare("") == 0) { // set only once
00063                 stringstream tmpFileName;
00064 
00065                 time_t rawtime;
00066                 struct tm* timeinfo;
00067 
00068                 time(&rawtime);
00069                 timeinfo = localtime(&rawtime);
00070 
00071                 tmpFileName << "20" // This will have to be adjusted in year 2100 ;-)
00072                                 << (timeinfo->tm_year)-100 << "-"
00073                                 << setw(2) << setfill('0')
00074                                 <<      (timeinfo->tm_mon)+1 << "-"
00075                                 << setw(2) << setfill('0')
00076                                 <<      timeinfo->tm_mday << "_"
00077                                 << setw(2) << setfill('0')
00078                                 <<      timeinfo->tm_hour << "-"
00079                                 << setw(2) << setfill('0')
00080                                 <<      timeinfo->tm_min << "-"
00081                                 << setw(2) << setfill('0')
00082                                 <<      timeinfo->tm_sec;
00083 
00084 //              cout << "tmpFileName " << tmpFileName.str() << endl;
00085                 Benchmark::timeStamp = tmpFileName.str();
00086 
00087                 Benchmark::directoryName = pathName +
00088                                 Benchmark::seperator +
00089                                 Benchmark::timeStamp;
00090 
00091                 int err;
00092 #ifdef WIN32 //__MSDOS__
00093                 err = _mkdir (directoryName.c_str());
00094 #else  /*  Unix */
00095                 err = mkdir (Benchmark::directoryName.c_str(), ACCESSPERMS);
00096 #endif
00097                 if (err < 0) {
00098                         string error = "ERROR: cannot create folder" + Benchmark::directoryName;
00099                         throw runtime_error(error.c_str());
00100                 }
00101         }
00102 
00103         /* concatenate resulting filename string */
00104         fileName = Benchmark::directoryName + Benchmark::seperator + benchmarkName + ".txt";
00105         cout << "INFO: Logging benchmark results to: " << fileName << endl;
00106 
00107         output.open(fileName.c_str(), ios::trunc);
00108 
00109 }
00110 
00111 }
